portfolioSummary.html: Senior developer with more than 20 years of experience in cross-platform web application development and enterprise application development. There are so many great work experiences to choose from but below are some of the most recent in the past.

details.html:
• Building front end applications architecture for hotel owners to manage their hotel activities such as setting up room and rates, connecting channels like Airbnb, Booking.com, etc…
  • Advising technical challenge solutions, teams’ way of working, mentoring new team members and helping with interview processes.

• Building micro front end applications architecture.
  • Implementing OIDC (OpenId Connect) to Forgerock (Identity and Access management)
  • Providing the web interface for external participants or operator to execute their activities.

• Building server-side rendering websites for Podcast One, HIT and Triple M.
  • Providing the mean for the audiences to interact with the businesses such as listening to podcast/radio live/on demand, reading news, joining competitions, providing feedback.
  • Implemented trackings such as GTM, Krux, Omny, Player Sensec.
  • Responsible for leading the delivery team, planning, code review and build.

• Building the customer pricing platform allows bankers to create/approve/reject/escalate offers for customers (existing, new-to-bank or a customer acting on behalf of another customer.
  • This platform is available for all Westpac group brands including Westpac, St.George, Bank of Melbourne, and BankSA.
  • Responsible for building React UI components, mentoring team members, and providing guidelines and directions for the team.

• Building new features for the website and mobile web
  • Implementing proof of concept for reusing the existing web UI components, building native applications by using React Native.

nodes.title: Pickles Auction
nodes.subTitle: Buyer ID application
nodes.technologies: Angular4 Typescript React Redux Webpack NodeJS

details.html:
• Building Buyer ID application to verify the auctioneers before entering the auction.
  • Building a search component for the main website.
  • Supporting marketing team to manage Kentico CMS.

• Building NestJs GraphQl endpoint to handle communications between MFEs and core API.
  • Setting up Newrelic for MFEs and BFF, ensure all applications having no vulnerabilities.

• Supporting and adding new features for ebanking website.
  • Mentoring juniors and helping to drive technologies stack.
